hero.desc: An architectural studio where ideas turn into stylish and functional projects. From concept to realization.

videosPage.heroSubtitle: Professional architectural and design courses created to elevate your skills and career.

course1.title: Modern Interior Design
course1.description: Learn how to design stunning and practical interior spaces with modern techniques.

course2.title: 3D Modeling & Visualization
course2.description: Master 3D visualization tools and bring your architectural concepts to life.

course3.title: Architectural Planning
course3.description: Understand how to plan, structure, and organize architectural projects from A to Z.

videosPage.feature1Desc: Each lesson is carefully crafted to provide clear, structured, and practical knowledge.
videosPage.feature2Desc: Learn from experienced architects and designers with real-world expertise.
videosPage.feature3Desc: Study at your own pace with full access to lessons on any device.

aboutPage.title: About Mava Group
aboutPage.intro: We are a multidisciplinary team of architects, designers, and engineers dedicated to creating meaningful spaces.
aboutPage.missionText: To shape environments that blend functionality, beauty, and sustainability, improving the way people live and work.
aboutPage.visionText: To become a leading architecture studio in Central Asia, known for innovation, quality, and timeless design.

values.title: Innovation
values.text: We constantly explore new ideas and technologies to bring unique solutions.

values.title: Quality
values.text: We deliver projects with precision, detail, and excellence in every step.

values.title: Sustainability
values.text: We prioritize eco-friendly materials and approaches for a better future.

values.title: Collaboration
values.text: We believe the best results come from working closely with clients and partners.

timeline.text: The company was founded in Tashkent with the goal of reimagining the country’s architecture.
A residential complex was completed, combining innovation with cultural traditions.
Expansion into foreign markets with sustainable solutions developed with international partners.

contactsPage.title: Contacts
contactsPage.subtitle: Get in touch with us to discuss projects or request a consultation.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subtitle: We will answer your questions and discuss project details.
form.name: Your Name
